data.comment: The match is underway in London.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 2, Brighton are coming forward and Danny Welbeck gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Can Brighton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Ham's half?
In the minute 4, Brighton's Neal Maupay gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Ham defender.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Brighton.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
West Ham have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, In London West Ham's Sebastian Haller is caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 9, In London, Declan Rice of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 11, Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in London.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for West Ham, close to Brighton's area.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 15, West Ham are pushing forward but Jarrod Bowen's finish is wide of the goal.
Simon Hooper awards Brighton a goal kick.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Brighton close to the penalty box.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Brighton.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Brighton at London Stadium.
Simon Hooper awards Brighton a goal kick.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 27, Adam Webster (Brighton) strikes at London Stadium but his header is cleared.
Brighton push forward at London Stadium and Dan Burn gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Ham defence.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 29, Simon Hooper signals a Brighton throw-in in West Ham's half.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Important block from the West Ham defence as Adam Webster fires in a strike for Brighton.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In the minute 34, In London Brighton attack through Solly March. The finish is off target, however.
West Ham have a goal kick.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Brighton.
Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Brighton.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in West Ham.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for West Ham, close to Brighton's area.
In the minute 40, Important block from the West Ham defence as Neal Maupay fires in a strike for Brighton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 41, Aaron Cresswell (West Ham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Brighton's Solly March is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! Neal Maupay gives Brighton a 0-1 lead in London.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in London.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at London Stadium.
In the minute 46, Brighton's Danny Welbeck has run offside.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Mark Noble with Manuel Lanzini.
David Moyes is making the team's second substitution at London Stadium with Andriy Yarmolenko replacing Jarrod Bowen.
Brighton make their first substitution with Steven Alzate replacing Adam Lallana.
Tomas Soucek of West Ham is pulled up for offside.
West Ham's Sebastian Haller gets in a shot on goal at London Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, West Ham to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 50, Simon Hooper signals a West Ham throw-in in Brighton's half.
Free kick in a good position for West Ham!
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 52, Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brighton's half?
Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Brighton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 56, Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Brighton at London Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Simon Hooper awards West Ham a goal kick.
Goal! Ben Johnson equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Manuel Lanzini.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Brighton in the half of West Ham.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Brighton at London Stadium.
Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 66, West Ham's Manuel Lanzini breaks free at London Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Simon Hooper signals a Brighton throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 68, Simon Hooper awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Lewis Dunk is on target to give Brighton a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Brighton have a goal kick.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Tomas Soucek (West Ham) nets with a header to make it 2-2 at London Stadium.
The away team have replaced Danny Welbeck with Pascal Gross. This is the second substitution made today by Graham Potter.
In the minute 84, Brighton's Solly March gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Ham.
In the minute 86, Tomas Soucek (West Ham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
In the minute 89, Vladimir Coufal (West Ham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Play has been interrupted briefly in London to check on Dan Burn, who is grimacing with pain.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
West Ham's Tomas Soucek goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Dan Burn is back on the pitch.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Brighton in the half of West Ham.
Free kick West Ham.
Tomas Soucek (West Ham) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Alireza Jahanbakhsh is replacing Neal Maupay for the away team.
